definition: to file a complaint/to appeal (to an authority, a higher court of justice etc)/complaint/appeal
to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen

sentences.english: PR8 Total number of substantiated complaints regarding breaches of customer privacy and losses of customer data.
sentences.chinese: PR8违反客户隐私及遗失客户资料的申诉案总数。

sentences.english: Now Thad has a solid ground for appeal.
sentences.chinese: 现在就有了一个坚实的申诉基础。

sentences.english: English-only policies generate few official grievances.
sentences.chinese: 只准讲英语的规定引起的官方申诉为数不多。

sentences.english: Local police and officials often ignore or fail to investigate migrants' complaints effectively.
sentences.chinese: 当地警方和官员经常无视或未有效调查移徙者的申诉。

sentences.english: Peace the inurbane parties and maintain the stability of society.
sentences.chinese: 对申诉无理的当事人做息诉工作，维护社会的稳定。

sentences.english: If you do not return to the bad comments buyer insists on appeal can I do?
sentences.chinese: 如果不退货买家执意给差评我可以申诉吗？

sentences.english: Jerry, how do you deal with letters of complaint from customers?
sentences.chinese: 请问你们如何处理客户申诉信？

sentences.english: So if they do complain, they risk being deported.
sentences.chinese: 因此如果她们提出申诉，她们就有被驱逐出境的危险。

sentences.english: Everyone has the right to appeal an adverse decision.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都权对不利决定进行申诉。

sentences.english: If disagrees with the reply, the passenger may appeal to the MCRCAS.
sentences.chinese: 乘客对答复有异议的，可以向市轨道交通处申诉。

sentences.english: Listen calmly to the speech of one who pleads;
For that whole group of citizens whose appeals for assistance have been similarly and irresponsibly denigrated.
sentences.chinese: 为所有的申诉求助后，被同样不负责任的诋毁的公众。

sentences.english: The defending counsel will meet tomorrow to prepare a petition against the verdicts.
sentences.chinese: 辩护律师将于明天会面，针对判决结果准备申诉书。

sentences.english: The risks of filing a case and losing in the WTO's dispute-settlement system are substantial.
sentences.chinese: 在WTO争端解决系统中申诉和失败的风险是潜在的。

sentences.english: It also introduces the right to appeal.
sentences.chinese: 新政策也推出了申诉权。

sentences.english: In fact this retaliatory complaints, you can only appeal on it.
sentences.chinese: 实际上这种报复性投诉，你只申诉就可以了。

definition: to register (to an official organism)/to file a case (for investigation)
common plea/civil appeal (as opposed to criminal case)
to protest against a verdict/to lodge an appeal
to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute
to re-investigate/to investigate and reconsider a judgment
complaint/to complain/to register a complaint (esp. as a customer)
